MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Caledonia Road and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are on site and in order to make a repair due to damage to our underground cable network we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:40am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3:30pm. We will make every effort to contact you if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:27am on Wednesday, 28 October 2020
